com.cube.storm.ui.view.player

Interface ExoMediaPlayer.InternalErrorListener

  • Enclosing class:
    ExoMediaPlayer

    public static interface ExoMediaPlayer.InternalErrorListener
    A listener for internal errors.

    These errors are not visible to the user, and hence this listener is provided for informational purposes only. Note however that an internal error may cause a fatal error if the player fails to recover. If this happens, ExoMediaPlayer.Listener.onError(Exception) will be invoked.
